flawed_nl_solution:
Her hair was 24" long and she cut half off so she cut 24/2 = <<24/2=12>>12 inches
Her hair was 24" long and she cut 12" off so she has 24-12 = <<24-12=12>>12 inches left
She has 12" of hair and lets it grow 4 more inches for a total of 12+4 = <<12+4=19>>19 inches
She has 19" and cuts off 2 more inches which leaves her hair 19-2 = <<19-2=17>>17 inches long
#### 17

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 16, not 19. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
